Genesect (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0648: Meloetta
Pokémon
#0650: Chespin →

Genesect has been featured on 14 different cards since it debuted in the Plasma Blast expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Genesect cards are normally Grass-type or Metal-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Genesect

Genesect
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
